titleStmt.title: Speciall good news from Ireland, being a true relation of a late and great victory obtained against the rebels in the north of Ireland: by that pious, prudent, and couragious commander, Sir VVill: Stewart, col. The truth whereof being confirmed by three severall letters directed to Mr. Abraham Pont, soliciter for the said Sir William in London.
titleStmt.author: Stewart, William, Sir, d. 1647?
Marshall, Thomas, 1621-1685.
Lockhart, John.

notesStmt.note: Three letters signed, respectively : Thom. Marshall, Will Stewart, Mr. John Lockhart.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
